attributes.action: save every bit of green and open space before it is all concreted over.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to save all the land which is green belt as our countryside is being developed and concreted over very quickly.  We need the open spaces for our children and our children's children.  This green and pleasant land is quickly being eroded - we need to breathe fresh air and still be able to walk in our local countryside before it is too late.  Believe me this government is intent on getting rid of all the green belt and open spaces - we must do something NOW!
